metadata.title: CVE-2024-26585 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: tls:fix race between tx work scheduling and socket close Similarly to previouscommit, the submitting thread (recvmsg/sendmsg) may exit as soon as theasync crypto handler calls complete(). Reorder scheduling the work beforecalling complete(). This seems more logical in the first place, as it's theinverse order of what the submitting thread will do.
